Title: Saved Hooks API Broken
Description: Page shows 'Failed to load hooks. Please try again.' - API endpoint not working
Impact: Users cannot access saved hooks feature at all
Recommendation: Fix API endpoint or remove feature from nav

Title: Leaderboard API Broken
Description: Page shows 'Failed to load leaderboard' - API endpoint failing
Impact: Gamification feature completely broken
Recommendation: Fix API endpoint and add proper error handling

Title: Wrong Auth State Display
Description: Sidebar shows 'Log in to see your stats' for logged-in users
Impact: Confusing UX - user thinks they're not logged in
Recommendation: Fix auth state detection in leaderboard sidebar

Title: TikTok Metadata Not Loading
Description: All analyses show '@unknown' author and 0 engagement metrics
Impact: Core value proposition degraded - no video context
Recommendation: Fix TikTok API integration or implement fallback

Title: Dead-End Coming Soon Page
Description: Analytics page is just a placeholder with no actual functionality
Impact: Broken promise - feature advertised but not delivered
Recommendation: Remove from nav or implement basic analytics from existing data

Title: Dashboard Demotivating Empty State
Description: New users see 'Viral Hits: 0' and 'Total Analyses: 0' prominently displayed
Impact: First impression shows failure metrics instead of potential
Recommendation: Hide zero-state cards or show encouraging messaging

Title: No Onboarding Flow
Description: New users land on dashboard with no guidance on what to do first
Impact: High drop-off risk - users don't know where to start
Recommendation: Add onboarding tooltip tour or modal for first-time users

Title: Free Plan Limit Warning
Description: '1 of 5 analyses remaining' shown but no clear upgrade value prop
Impact: Users see limit but may not understand Pro benefits
Recommendation: Add inline plan comparison when limit is low

Title: Score Column Headers Cut Off
Description: H/T/A score columns partially visible on right side of list
Impact: Users can't see full breakdown without hovering/scrolling
Recommendation: Add tooltips or expand column width

Title: URL Format Hints Missing
Description: No indication of which TikTok URL formats are accepted
Impact: Users may paste wrong format and get errors
Recommendation: Add helper text showing accepted formats

Title: Output Preview Missing
Description: Users don't know what 'Analyze Niche' produces before clicking
Impact: Lower conversion - unclear value proposition
Recommendation: Add sample output preview below the form

Title: Generated Script History Missing
Description: No way to view previously generated scripts
Impact: Users lose valuable generated content
Recommendation: Add 'My Scripts' history section

Title: No Audio Preview
Description: Users cannot hear trending sounds before using them
Impact: Reduced utility - users can't evaluate sounds
Recommendation: Add audio preview snippets for each sound

Title: Day Click Doesn't Add Event
Description: Clicking on a calendar day doesn't open the add event modal
Impact: Standard calendar UX expectation not met
Recommendation: Add click handler on calendar days

Title: Upload Progress Missing
Description: No progress indicator during video upload
Impact: Users unsure if upload is working for large files
Recommendation: Add upload progress bar with percentage

Title: No 'Analyze Another' CTA
Description: After viewing analysis no clear path to analyze next video
Impact: Momentum lost - user has to navigate back manually
Recommendation: Add 'Analyze Another Video' button at bottom

Title: No Value Explanation
Description: Empty state doesn't explain what competitor tracking shows
Impact: Users don't know why they should add competitors
Recommendation: Add 'What you'll see' preview in empty state

Title: Niche Chips Don't Auto-Fill
Description: Clicking niche suggestion chips doesn't populate the input field
Impact: Minor friction - user expects auto-fill behavior
Recommendation: Add onClick handler to populate input

Title: No TikTok Sound Links
Description: 'Copy Name' less useful than direct link to TikTok sound
Impact: Extra steps for users to find sound on TikTok
Recommendation: Add direct TikTok sound page links

Title: Success Rate Metric Unclear
Description: 'Success Rate: Building baseline...' with no explanation
Impact: Users don't understand what this metric means
Recommendation: Add tooltip explaining the metric

Title: No Social Sharing
Description: No way to share high-score analysis results
Impact: Missing viral/word-of-mouth opportunity
Recommendation: Add share buttons for scores 70+

Title: No Timing Integration
Description: Calendar not connected to analysis timing scores
Impact: Missed opportunity to suggest best posting times
Recommendation: Integrate timing recommendations from analyses

Title: Settings Links May Not Work
Description: Billing/Notifications/Privacy/Help links untested
Impact: Potential broken links in settings
Recommendation: Test and implement all settings sub-pages

Title: Example Video Missing
Description: No sample video for users to try before using their own
Impact: Higher barrier to first analysis
Recommendation: Add 'Try with sample video' option
